column5: Kinghorn is a lovely little village town in Fife#Comma Scotland. A seaside resort with two beaches#Comma Kinghorn Beach and Pettycur Bay#Comma#Newline            plus a fishing port#Comma it stands on the north shore of the Firth of Forth#Comma opposite Edinburgh and according to the 2008 population#Newline            estimate#Comma the town has a population of 2#Comma930
